alert.note: Alert for Ford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ford and southern Iroquois Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 131 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paxton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paxton, Milford, Cissna Park, Stockland, Loda, Wellington, Clarence and Claytonville. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 258 and 265. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
